text: Ozar, Madhya Pradesh is a village in Rajpur tehsil of Barwani district in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh. ==Geography== Ozar is located in the Narmada Valley, at . Ozar lies from Barwani & from Rajpur. ==Demographics== India census, Ozar had a population of 6,902. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Ozar has an average literacy rate of 62%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 56%, and female literacy is 44%. In Ozar, 15% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== ==External links== * Barwani District Category:Villages in Barwani district Category:Barwani district
title: Ozar, Madhya Pradesh
